data.title: Why do football managers get fired so frequently?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 7): Modern football is a business more than a sport.

The top bosses are businessmen. The people who decide when to fire a manager, are all people who run the club like a business.  Considering a few cases, Roman Abrahimovich is a Russian business tycoon who has invested billions and...
